results.name: a(n) = phi(n)+1.
comment: Records give A000040. - _Omar E. Pol_, Jul 10 2014
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000

formula: G.f.: x/(1 - x) + Sum_{k>=1} mu(k)*x^k/(1 - x^k)^2. - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Mar 16 2017
